dmca.title: Playboy DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
Email
http://jonathanjaxson.blogspot.com/2007/03/kim-ks-nude-photos.html

-- 
Alice Wu  |  Web Products  |  Legal Support
Google Inc.  |  1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View  |  CA  |  94043
650.253.0688 voice  |  650.618.1806 facsimile  alicewu@google.com
Page 2 of 2 
Mountain View, CA 94043 
Dear Sir or Madam: 
It has been brought to our attention that web pages at www.blogspot.com (66.10215.100) display, without authorization, reproductions of images owned by Playboy Enterprises Intemational, Inc. (``Playboy''). All right, title and interest in and to these images belongs to Playboy. 
I believe in good faith that the disputed images displayed on www.blopspot.com (66.102.15.100) are not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law. 
Accordingly, please remove the unauthorized reproductions of Playboy copyrighted images on www.bbgspot.com (66.102.15.100) and on all web pages under your control. 
Examples of the copyrighted material can be found at the following links: 
http://ionathai axson.blogsvot.com/2007/03/kim-ks-nude-photos.html 
http://jonathanj axson.blogsvot.comlsearchllabelldecember%2Oplayboy 
http://byO.blogger.comlrclZR9tXpeO/RyK3IhYeSXTJAAAAAAAACNA/uXRoiP297uo/sl 600- h/Page_3.jpg 
http:IIby3 .blogger.coml_rclZR9tXgeO/RyK3IRYeSWI/AAAAAAAACM4/mgrixRhgYWkls 1600- h/Page_2.jpg 
htto:/Iby2.blogger.eoml_rc1ZR9tXaeOIRyPuikYeSgTJAAAAAAAACOIIXrX8g82NPGw/sl 600-h/kim- kardashian-vlaybov-cover.JPG.ipg 
I, Tatyana Cherkashina, under penalty of perjury, am authorized to act on behalf of Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. in regard to the above-mentioned unauthorized reproduction of the Playboy copyrighted images. My contact information is as follows: Playboy Enterprises International, Inc., [redacted] Lakeshore Drive, Chicago, Illinois 60611, Fax [redacted], phone 312-751 -8000, E-mail address is tcherkashina©playboy.com. 
We look forward to hearing from you and resolving this mailer immediately. 
This letter is not intended to and shall not waive or prejudice any rights and remedies that Playboy may have at law, in equity or otherwise. Any and all such rights and remedies are hereby expressly reserved. 
PLAYBOY E TERPRIS INTERNATIONAL, INC. 
Tatyana Cherk shina 
Intellectual Property Assistant 
11/19/2007
